Articles.Content: I read under major features that construction at orbit and other celestials would be a part of the main game, so I know that this didn't really belong under suggestions. I just wonder why they would stop allowing people to go back to the station once they get something in orbit? I really want this feature back because I wanted to have an interplanetary space vehicle... so now what I have to vertically dock on the moon LOL? grr I was just getting good at docking and consistently nice co-planar orbits le sigh
